data.title: WiiU VC Wii inject compatibility list
data.text:
Game Name Region Host game Gamepad Status Notes A Boy and His Blob USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Managed to get the GamePad to work! Instructions to long to fit here, instead click Here for FULL instructions to get GamePad working. FIX94's GetExtType Patcher doesn't work as it can't find anything to patch in the main.dol file. Works on EUR region console. A Shadow's Tale Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Lost in Shadow - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. AC DC Live - Rock Band Track Pack USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Action Girlz Racing USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Agatha Christie - And Then There Were None Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Alien Syndrome Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Alien Syndrome USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Alone in the Dark USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. AMF Bowling Pinbusters! USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. AMF Bowling World Lanes USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Works on EUR region console using patch video mode. Animal Crossing - City Folk USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Issues Works fw.img patched to emulate Wii Remote only instead of Classic Controller on GamePad. GamePad control works however there is a scrolling message across the middle of the screen saying: This game doesn't support the extension controller connected to the Wii Remote. Can't get past the Player Name input screen, as motion control is needed to input player name. Also works on EUR region console. Anno - Create a New World Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Dawn of Discovery - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Another Code: R Europe Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Doesn't work Works 1:1 clean dump (CleanRip), DON'T SCRUB AND/OR TRIM not even with WIT. Also works on USA region console. Anubis II USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Arc Rise Fantasia USA Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Works Works 1:1 dump, clean fw.img. Works on EUR region console using patch video mode Avatar - The Last Airbender USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Avatar - The Legend of Aang - EU. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Avatar - The Last Airbender - Into the Inferno USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Avatar - The Legend of Aang - Into the Inferno - EU. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Avatar - The Last Airbender - The Burning Earth USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Avatar - The Legend of Aang - The Burning Earth - EU. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Avatar - The Legend of Aang Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Avatar - The Last Airbender - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Avatar - The Legend of Aang - Into the Inferno Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Avatar - The Last Airbender - Into the Inferno - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Avatar - The Legend of Aang - The Burning Earth Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Avatar - The Last Airbender - The Burning Earth - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead.

Game Name Region Host game Gamepad Status Notes Back to the Future - The Game USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Baroque USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Must use Force CC Connected option in TeconMoon WiiVC Injector. Also works on EUR region console. Batman - The Brave and the Bold USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Battalion Wars 2 Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Battalion Wars 2 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Big Brain Academy - Wii Degree Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Big Brain Academy - Wii Degree USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Big League Sports - Summer USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Bit.Trip Complete USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Issues Issues Set to horizontal Wii Remote emulation. Added notes: Whoever added this saying to set to Horizontal Wii Remote emulation obviously didn't bother to check. Here is the low down: BEAT => Requires Wii Remote Motion Controls. CORE => Requires Wii Remote (no motion controls). VOID => Requires Classic Controller or Nunchuck required. RUNNER => Requires Wii Remote (no motion controls). FATE => Requires Classic Controller or Nunchuck required. FLUX => Requires Wii Remote Motion Controls. If you inject with GamPad support, this will only work with VOID and FATE, if you inject Horizontal Wii Remote emulation, this will only work with CORE and RUNNER. If you choose either GamePad support or Horizontal Wii Remote emulation, out of the 6 games, you will end up with 4 not working. Bleach Versus Crusade (English Patch) Japan Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game is JAP only release, English patched and region patched, confirmed working on EUR region console, untested on USA region console. Bomberman Japan Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game does not work on EUR region console, NTSC-J to PAL video mode patch must be applied for game to work on EUR/PAL region console. Not tested on USA region console. Bomberman Land Wii Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game does not support Classic Controller. Also known as Bombermand Land - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Bomberman Land USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Bombermand Land Wii - EU. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Boom Blox - Bash Party Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Boom Blox - Bash Party USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Brave - A Warrior's Tale Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Brave - A Warrior's Tale USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Broken Sword - Shadow of the Templars - The Director's Cut USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Brunswick Pro Bowling Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Brunswick Pro Bowling USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Brunswick Zone Cosmic Bowling USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console. Bully - Scholarship Edition USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game does not support Classic Controller, also works on EUR region console Bust-a-Move Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Even though game supports Classic Controller, it is only used as an additional/secondary controller, game still requires pointer motion controls to navigate menu and play. Also known as Bust-a-Move BASH! - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Bust-a-Move BASH! USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Same notes as above, also known as Bust-a-Move - EU. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead.

Game Name Region Host game Gamepad Status Notes Call of Duty 3 USA Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Call of Duty: Black Ops USA Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Works Works Game may require CC resync, click HERE for instructions. Also works on EUR region console. Call of Duty: Modern Warfare - Reflex Edition USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't support Classic Controller. Also works on EUR region console. Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 USA Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Works Works Game may require CC resync, click HERE for instructions. Also works on EUR region console. Call of Duty: World at War USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't support Classic Controller. Also works on EUR region console. Calling Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Calling USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Captain Rainbow Japan Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Some Japanese text that doesn't show correctly, this is due to the system language not set to Japanese. USA/EUR does not have Japanese as an language option, as far as I can tell, if you don't connect a Nunchuck, this is where the Japanese text is not showing correctly, however in game Japanese text is fine. You will not have this issue on the JAP region WiiU console. Cars USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Cartoon Network - Punch Time Explosion XL USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. Castlevania Judgement USA Super Mario Galaxy 2 (EUR) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. Chaotic - Shadow Warriors USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Cocoto Magic Circus USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Conduit 2 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. Cooking Mama - Cook Off USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Cooking Mama - World Kitchen USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Cooking Mama 2 - World Kitchen - EU. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Cooking Mama 2 - World Kitchen Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Cooking Mama - World Kitchen - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Counter Force Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Counter Force USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console, however system will freeze on exit on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Cruis'n USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game doesn't support Classic Controller, however game uses sideways remote. TeconMoon v3.0.1, use "*Horizontal Wii Remote emulation" option in "GamePad/Meta Options. When game starts, make sure to go to Options Menu => Change Control Method [p1] to +Control Pad. Pressing the Home button on the GamePad, then the Home button again to get back into the game will result in a "Please remove any extension controllers" message. To get around this, hold down the POWER button on GamePad until GamePad turns off, wait a few seconds, then press Power button again. Also works on EUR region console. Cursed Mountain USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console.

Game Name Region Host game Gamepad Status Notes Dancing Stage - Hottest Party Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Dance Dance Revolution - Hottest Party - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Dance Dance Revolution - Hottest Party USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Dancing Stage - Hottest Party - US. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Dance Dance Revolution - Hottest Party 2 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. Dance Dance Revolution - Hottest Party 3 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Dance Dance Revolution II USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as DDR - Hottest Party 5 - EU. Also works on EUR region console. Data East Arcade Classics USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game requires CC resync, click HERE for instructions, NTSC to PAL video mode patch must be applied for game to work on EUR/PAL region console. Dawn of Discovery USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Anno - Create a New World - EU. Also works on EUR region console. de Blob USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. de Blob 2 Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. de Blob 2 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Dead Rising - Chop Till You Drop USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Dead Space Extraction Europe Xenoblade Chronicles (EUR) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Dead Space Extraction USA Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Deadly Creatures USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Death Jr. Root of Evil USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Dino Strike USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. DiRT 2 USA Super Mario Galaxy 2 (EUR) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. Disaster Day of Crisis Europe Xenoblade Chronicles (EUR) Doesn't work Works Also works on USA region console. Disney Epic Mickey USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Disney Tangled Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Disney Tangled USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Doala De Wii Japan Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR/USA region console. Dokapon Kingdom USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. Donkey Kong Country Returns USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works GamePad works patching main.dol with Classic Controller .gct code, and using Force CC setting (TeconMoon 3.0.0). Also works on EUR region console Donkey Kong - Barrel Blast USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Donkey Kong - Jet Race - EU. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead Donkey Kong - Jet Race Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Donkey Kong - Barrel Blast - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Donkey Kong - Jungle Beat USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Dragon Ball - Revenge of King Piccolo Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Dragon Ball - Revenge of King Piccolo USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 2 Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Same as Tenkaichi 3 (see below). Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 2 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Same as Tenkaichi 3 (see below), also suffers from random button presses when Nunchuck is connected in NO GamePad mode, however Classic Controller connected is fine. Also works on EUR region console Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 3 Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works TeconMoon v3.0.1, use "**Force Classic Controller Connected" option in "GamePad/Meta Options', tested and working. UPDATED NOTES: If you wish to play multiplayer using Wii Remote + Nunchuck when you select NO to GamePad play, with Nunchuck connected, the game will have random button presses, however Classic Controller connected is fine. so if you want Wii Remote + Nunchuck multiplayer, then dont use the "**Force Classic Controller Connected" option. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 3 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works See notes above. UPDATED NOTES: Same issues as EU version regarding Multiplayer. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Dragon Blade - Wrath of Fire Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Dragon Blade - Wrath of Fire USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Dragon Quest Swords - The Masked Queen and the Tower of Mirrors Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Dragon Quest Swords - The Masked Queen and the Tower of Mirrors USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game works on EUR region console by using patching ISO with RegionFrii and NTSC to PAL video mode patch or use EUR version instead. Dragon's Lair Trilogy USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console.

Game Name Region Host game Gamepad Status Notes Mad Dog McCree Gunslinger Pack USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console. . Madagascar 2 - Escape 2 Africa Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Madden NFL 13 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works May not work on EUR region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and NTSC to PAL Video Mode patch. MadWorld Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't Work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. MadWorld USA Donkey Kong Country Returns (USA) / Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Doesn't Work Works No CCP support, game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Manhunt 2 USA Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Doesn't Work Works Also works on EUR region console. Marble Saga - Kororinpa USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Marbles! - Balance Challenge - EU. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Marbles! - Balance Challenge - EU USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Marble Saga - Kororinpa - US. Game doesn't work on USA region console, use USA version instead. Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Mario Kart Wii USA Super Mario Galaxy 2 (EUR) / Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Works Works Mario Kart Wii Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Only tested on EUR region console. Mario Kart Wii + Wiimmfi Europe Xenoblade Chronicles (EUR) Works Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Wiimmfi no longer works on Mario Kart Wii if using Wii U VC Injects. Use vWii to play online. (Other games still work fine.) Mario Kart Wii + Wiimmfi USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. Wiimmfi no longer works on Mario Kart Wii if using Wii U VC Injects. Use vWii to play online. (Other games still work fine.) Mario Party 8 Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works GGame may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Mario Party 8 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Mario Party 9 Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Mario Party 9 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Mario Power Tennis USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Mario Sports Mix USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game doesn't support Classic Controller, but the game can be played with Sideways remote. Patch game with Horizontal Wii Remote Emulation for the GamePad. Only motion control used in the game is the FAKE OUT move for Dodgeball. There is no way to get back to the WiiU menu, so force shutdown is required. Also works on EUR region console. Mario Strikers Charged USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Mario Strikers Charged Football - EU. Also works on EUR region console. Mario Super Sluggers USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works TeconMoon v3.0.1, use "**Force Classic Controller Connected" option in "GamePad/Meta Options'. Controls a awkward because game is using vertical controls at the start, before the innings starts there is option to change control scheme to horizontal which disables all motion control and game plays fine. Game will boot to black screen on EUR/PAL console, NTSC to PAL video mode must be patched for it to work on EUR/PAL console, Martian Panic USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Marvel - Ultimate Alliance 2 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Mercury Meltdown Revolution USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Metal Slug Anthology USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Issues Works TeconMoon v3.0.1, use "*Horizontal Wii Remote emulation" option in "GamePad/Meta Options', tested and working with issues, motion control does not work which means you are unable to throw grenades. Also works on EUR region console. Metal Slug Collection Japan Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works TeconMoon v3.0.1, use "**Force Classic Controller Connected" option in "GamePad/Meta Options', tested and working. Added Note: Must change controller type to Classic Controller in the Game Options menu prior to selecting a game to play, then CC requires resync by pressing HOME button on GamePad twice. Also works on EUR/USA region console, there has been reports that the system will freeze when trying to play Metal Slug 6. Metroid: Other M USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. Metroid Prime 3: Corruption USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Use clean 1:1 dump, DO NOT TRIM rom. Also works on EUR region console. Metroid Prime Trilogy USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Wii Remote support only. Milestone Shooting Collection 2 Japan Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR/USA region console. Mobile Suit Gundam - MS Sensen 0079 Japan Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR/USA region console. Monopoly Collection USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) issues Works Game doesn't support Classic Controller, but can be patched with "Horizontal or Vertical Wii Remote Emulation". Monopoly Streets sideways remote is correct using Horizontal patch, but Monopoly thinks its vertical mode. If you patch using Vertical, Monopoloy sideways remote is correct but Monopoly Street think it's vertical. So use one or the other. Game does use some waggle controls, like rolling the dice, but you can simply press A button to roll the dice, mini games use waggle controls. Also works on EUR region console. More Game Party Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also known as Game Party 2 - US. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Mortal Kombat - Armageddon USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't Work Works Despite game supporting CC, game doesn't detect CC, resyncing methods doesn't work, also used FIX94's GetExtType Patcher to patch the main.dol file for GamePad, pathcing works, but game still doesn't detect CC. So Wii Remote/Nunchuck/CC/GC controller only. Also works on EUR region console. Muramasa - The Demon Blade Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Muramasa - The Demon Blade USA Xenoblade Chronicles (USA) Works Works 1:1 dump, stock fw.img. Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. MySims USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. MySims Agents USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. MySims Kingdom USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console.

Game Name Region Host game Gamepad Status Notes Namco Museum Megamix USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game supports Classic Controller in various game, but Wii Remote + Nunchuck is required to navigate Pacman around the map and the game menus. Also works on EUR region console. Naruto Shippuden - Clash of Ninja Revolution 3 Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Naruto Shippuden - Clash of Ninja Revolution 3 USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Naruto Shippuden - Dragon Blade Chronicles Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works French and Italian language only. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Naruto Shippuden - Dragon Blade Chronicles USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Game doesn't work on EUR region console, must use video mode patch to make it work on EUR region console. Naruto Shippuden - Gekito Ninja Taisen! Special Japan Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Also works on EUR/USA region console. NASCAR Kart Racing USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Issues Works Often does not recognize Classic Controller, especially when "reconnecting" after timeout. If you have the means to patch the main.dol before injecting the game, go to 0x53D30 and replace 4BFFE7E1 with 60000000 to prevent the game from disabling the Classic Controller. NASCAR Unleashed USA Super Mario Galaxy 2 (EUR) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. NBA Jam USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Also works on EUR region console. Need for Speed: Carbon Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. Need for Speed: Nitro USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Change controller type to Classic Controller in the options menu. Also works on EUR region console. Need for Speed: Undercover USA Super Mario Galaxy 2 (EUR) Works Works NERF N-Strike Double Blast Bundle USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't Work Works Also works on EUR region console. New Super Mario Bros. Wii Europe Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't Work Works Same notes as USA version below. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. New Super Mario Bros. Wii USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't Work Works No available configuration works to enable GamePad support, CC .gct code applies to real CC though when patching the main.dol (tested with TeconMoon 3.0.0). Game doesn't work on EUR region console, use EUR version instead. Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii (Hack) Europe Xenoblade Chronicles (EUR) Doesn't Work Works Classic Control does not work cannot be patched either. Game may not work on USA region console, try patching ISO with RegionFrii and PAL to NTSC Video Mode patch or use USA version instead. New Super Mario Bros. 3+ (Hack) USA Donkey Kong Country Returns (USA) Doesn't Work Works No CCP support NHL 2K11 USA Super Mario Galaxy 2 (EUR)/Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Works Works Work fine in PAL console. Nicktoons - Attack of the Toybots USA Rhythm Heaven Fever (USA) Doesn't work Works Also works on EUR region console. The game should now detect the GamePad, only issue with the patched CC support for the Undubbed version is that you will not be able to exit back to the WiiU menu, use the GamePad's power button to turn off the WiiU console.
